title: What level for clubs?
body: Hi I made a new a account so I can play with some of my beginner friends but I want to also join a club, so what level do I at least have to be to join clubs?

replies.body: lol I'm level 15 and I cant get into clubs.. rito fix{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

The minimum level should be 2 for joining clubs. Then you should send a request to join the club to the owner and they should be able to add you.

If you're already level 2 on that new account an unable to join still, hit up our Game Support team [**in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new); they should be able to find out why and get things fixed right up for you. Don't wanna keep you from playin with you friends! ^^
